title: Creating a Clean Eating Revolution Online
itunes:title: Creating a Clean Eating Revolution Online
description:
JJ and Erika Peterson, Founders of Clean Simple Eats, discuss using social media to spread the word about their healthy meal plans and recipes.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
